original_body_lines: The wife and the children of Pastor Jerome Fernando who made hate comments against Buddhism, Islam and Hinduism, returned to the island through the Bandaranaike International Airport (BIA), airport sources said.
They said the wife and children arrived from Singapore last Friday (02) night via Singapore Airlines flight SQ-468.

It was reported that a group of 12 individuals including Pastor Jerome's wife and children had earlier left for Singapore. Since an overseas travel ban has been imposed on Jerome Fernando, his wife and others have returned to Sri Lanka. (T.K.G. Kapila)
